message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. Considering its worth to you, I propose a transaction price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I look forward to discussing this further with you and exploring how we can make this deal happen.
